name: Goldsmiths Expressive Game Design Development Blog And Prototypes
name_original: Goldsmiths Expressive Game Design Development Blog And Prototypes
description:
A game intended to be a single-screen challenging arcade style game where you dodge asteroids and try to stay in the middle of the screen against winds trying to push you astray.

The player moves with the arrow keys and points are gained by staying in the center of the screen and lost by being offscreen - if we had more time and less other modules to focus on, we would have potentially added a life system that's lost by being out of bounds or hitting meteors.

The game's title screen explains all the different powerups and what they do.
